p.k: World famous dancer Trey Donovan (Marcus London) has built a strong reputation for his dance academy and heâ€™ll let nothing tarnish his legacy. When his lead dancer and secret lover, Olivia (Katana Kombat) threatens to make their relationship public, she is abruptly fired and dismissed. Auditions are held to find a replacement and two rival dancers vie for the position - Hannah (Emily Willis), the sweet new girl with natural talent, and Sadie (Gianna Dior), the bitchy veteran dancer who will do whatever it takes to get the job.
